body.name: 7MAGIC Fast-Drying Hair Dryer, Foldable Ionic with Storage Bag for Travel, Lightweight Portable Hairdryer for Women & Men, Negative, 2 Heating/Cold/2 Speed Settings, Green
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 11 hrs 7 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 20. Order within 11 hrs 7 mins
features: 【Prevent 99% of the Hair from Being Inhaled】We have upgraded and improved the design of the hair dryer inlet, which can 99% prevent hair from being inhaled. As well as the addition of a removable double safety dust cover can prevent dust and particles from being sucked into the blow dryer. Additional small soft brush accessories, you can always clean the air inlet and dust cover to ensure wind power

【Blowing Hair Time 30% Faster than Ordinary Hair Dryer】7MAGIC hair dryer's wind speed is 2 times the other hairdryer; the maximum wind speed is 18m/s; the rotational speed is 32000 RPM. Drying hair is 30% faster than the ordinary hair dryer. It only takes 1-2 minutes for short hair, 3-5 minutes for medium-length hair, and 5-8 minutes for thick and long hair

【Foldable, Compact, and Light Weight】Folding hair dryer is lightweight (0.88 lbs) and compact size is 7.67*5.11*2.08 inch. It is easy to carry, and store and does not take up space at home. The collapsible travel hair dryer with our storage bag is great for business trips or travel. Suitable for home, school dormitory, gym use, and hair salon for styling

【3 Temperatures & 2 Speeds & Negative Ion Function】7MAGIC ionic hair dryer offers 3 temperature settings (COOL/ WARM/ HOT) and 2-speed settings (LOW/ HIGH) for regular drying, quick drying, and hair styling. In addition, our professional hair dryer uses ionic technology to release millions of negative ions to protect hair from heat damage, prevent excessive dryness caused by high temperatures, and maintain the hair's natural moisture

【Overheating Safety Protection Settings】 When the internal components of the ionic blow dryer sense that the temperature exceeds the safety range, the professional blow dryer will automatically power off to start the protection mechanism. You can wait for the temperature to drop before using it again. When encountering extreme conditions, the thermal fuse will be irreversibly blown for protection
body.description: Core Features of Travel Blow Dryer 1. 5min to dry hair quickly, 30% faster than other negative ion hair dryer 2. Detachable air filter, 99% of your hair does not get sucked into the dryer 3. Compact hair dryer with our storage bag, easy to carry, easy to store 4. Lightweight and slim design will help you avoid arm cramps when drying your hair 5. 3 temperature settings (COOL/ WARM/ HOT) and 2-speed settings (LOW/ HIGH) 6. Overheating safety protection settings

Specifications of Lightweight Hair Dryer Wattage: 1600W Input voltage: 110V-125V Hz range: 60Hz RPM: 32000RPM Wind speed: 18m/s Size: 7.67*5.11*2.08in /19.5*13*5.3cm Weight: 0.88lb Package list: 1*travel size hair dryer for men and women, 1*concentrator nozzle, 1*storage bag, 1*small soft brush, 1*manual Core Features of Travel Blow Dryer 1. 5min to dry hair quickly, 30% faster than other negative ion hair dryer 2. Detachable air filter, 99% of your hair does not get sucked into the dryer 3. Compact hair dryer with our storage bag, easy to carry, easy to store 4. Lightweight and slim design will help you avoid arm cramps when drying your hair 5. 3 temperature settings (COOL/ WARM/ HOT) and 2-speed settings (LOW/ HIGH) 6. Overheating safety protection settings

Double Overheat Protection Setting 1. When the temperature control element senses that the temperature exceeds the safety range, the fast drying hair dryer will automatically power off to start the protection mechanism 2. Thermal fuse can be irreversibly blown under extreme conditions to protect Eliminate Frizz and Take Care of Your Hair Our negative ion blow dryer uses ionic technology to release millions of negative ions to eliminate frizz and add shine as you dry your hair Foldable and Easy to Carry With a foldable design, the hair dryer can easily be stored in a suitcase or luggage bag without taking up extra space. With an attached storage bag, the compact blow dryer can be easily carried and stored during the trip

Lightweight and Comfortable to Hold This portable hair dryer weighs 0.88lb, and is compact and lightweight. with a slim handle for a comfortable grip to help you avoid arm cramps while drying your hair. ALCI Safety Plugs ALCI safety plugs with leakage and overheating protection for your and your family's safety Compact Size Hair Dryer for Traveling This portable blow dryer measures 7.7*5*1.9 inch and is about the size of 2 bananas when folded; it is lighter than other lightweight blow dryer and dries hair faster than traditional ion blow dryer "This product is designed for a voltage of 110V, and a voltage converter is required when using it during travel."

Can be used on different occasions and suitable for different hair types, such as long, short, curly, straight, thin, and thick hair. You can easily carry storage due to collapsible hair dryer and the attached storage bag, does not take up extra space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a lot of long hair and blow drying my hair is time consuming chore. This hair dryer does not make the bathroom hot and dried my hair in much less time than my old hairdryer. It is lightweight and folds nicely to save space. I love the deep emerald green color, the removable filter is a nice feature if you have ever tried to get the lint off an old school hairdryer with a toothpick, you will love this feature. Definitely recommend this hairdryer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and compact
reviews.reviewText: This is a great little hair dryer. It's small but powerful. I also love the travel bag that came with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little hair dryer
reviews.reviewText: This hair dryer is great! Dries my hair quickly. Simple foldable design that is great for travel. The head part is approximately 7-3/4” long. It features a cool fan mode, low heat, and high heat. The filter cover at the back twists off for easy cleaning.Included is a simple diffuser. If I have one critique about this it would be that if using the diffuser on high heat it does get fairly hot itself. You may want to let it cool before removing the diffuser.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and powerful!
reviews.reviewText: This hair dryer was exactly what I wanted! It's lightweight, but delivers plenty of heat and power. It dries my hair quickly. Comes with carry pouch for travel. Folds up for space saving. Perhaps one negative is it's a little noisy, but because it works fast, the noise doesn't last long. Love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dryer!
reviews.reviewText: Not only does this dryer work really well, it’s also such a pretty color and I love how it folds up and fits easily into my drawer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Best thing I have purchased on Amazon, I like my nice hair products and a fabulous blow out. I am very picky about hair dryers and have spent hundreds of dollars on nice ones. I have to say this one is fast, has just the right amount of heat, it’s small, not too loud, lightweight and it’s super cute. I would recommend this to everyone and anyone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Hairdryer for Traveling
reviews.reviewText: This lightweight, easy to fold and pack, and high power hair dryer is THE BEST for traveling. As most everyone knows, hotel hair dryers aren't very powerful and my hair takes a long time to dry when I use them. Also, the ones at the hotels don't come with any different nozzles. This one comes with a styling nozzle, allows me to dry my hair much quicker, and it's so easy to travel with. The only thing I wish is that it has different heat/no heat options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winner with my wife!
reviews.reviewText: Light weight, very good power, folds up, and she likes the shade of green! ✅ I liked the price! 👍
